parameter.name: doorCount
parameter.label: Number of Doors Controlled
parameter.description: Number of doors that are connected to the controller. Check Thing Properties to see maximum number of doors and number of connected doors for the garage controller.

parameter.name: webServerAddress
parameter.label: API Web Server Address/URL
parameter.description: TailWind web service address. Either HTTP URL of web service (preferred) or IP address of controller.

parameter.name: authToken
parameter.label: Authentication Token
parameter.description: Authentication token (Local Control Key) obtained from the TailWind mobile app.

parameter.name: openHabHostAddress
parameter.label: OH Server IPV4 Address
parameter.description: Primary IPV4 address of the OpenHab server running this binding. In the UI check Settings, Network Settings for value.

parameter.name: doorOneName
parameter.label: Door 1 Name
parameter.description: Door 1: Specify a more descriptive name for the garage door.

parameter.name: doorOnePartialOpen
parameter.label: Door 1 Partial Open
parameter.description: Door 1: Seconds to use for partially opening the garage door (0.5 - 15 seconds), only valid if door is being controlled.

parameter.name: doorTwoPartialOpen

parameter.description: Door 2: Seconds to use for partially opening the garage door (0.5 - 15 seconds), only valid if door is being controlled.
